Moses in Egypt (arr. J. A. Greenwood)
Selby, North Yorkshire, England, UK March contest - 1st Yeadon Old, 2nd Moderna, 3rd Hammonds Sauce Works. Waltz contest - 1st Yeadon Old, 2nd Bradford City, 3rd Moderna. Prizes - 1st £20, 2nd £12, 3rd £6. Promoted by Selby Agricultural Society.
